name: Muscles
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Natalie Martinez, Benjamin Martinez, Jordan Matthews, and Melvin Dargan

"Your name is Musk Lee and you love your muscles. Your life was going perfect until the tragedy. On one fateful night, your wife and daughter were kidnapped. But most importantly, they stole your muscles!! Fight your enemies and regain your honor in this humorous fight game, MUSCLES"

to move: A & D

to attack: J (jab), K (kick), L (muscle throw)
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
